channel.title: New Server
channel.description:
Please read the whole topic.
My name is Austin Skaggs. I'm 15 and have wanted to start a server for quite a while. I'm not looking for my own server exactly but to be on a dev team with someone. I am an amateur coder and can only do very basic things. If you put me on the project I would only like to be an admin or Co-Owner. If you are wondering about staff experience i have plenty. I can be a loyal staff member and I am always willing to help in any way that I can. I will advertise as well as stay true to the server. I will try and find glitches and get to know the players to try and make it as fun for them as possible. Please reply asap I want to get started and help make the greatest server ever.

item.title: New Server
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

There shall be no trashing done!

@OP If you want to volunteer your services, please post on the specific development team topic that you wish to join.

Read full topic
